name: Refrigerate
summary: Coverts all normal moves to Ice-type moves, with a 30% boost.
viability: Nature Power turns into Tri Attack in Wi-Fi and other standard battling sets, which turns an 80 base power move to 104, with a 30% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze. Being an Ice-type move, it has great coverage. In addition, given Aurorus's good Special Attack, this should be able to do a lot of damage.
